duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain a talent pool of candidates in the service industry.
Identify talent and create a system within the applicant tracking system for managers to screen candidates through.
Attend various career fairs throughout the Spokane, WA area.
Work from home with administrative tasks.

education_certification.credential:
At least 1 year of experience in a relatable field.
Fluent written and verbal in Spanish and English.
